title: Metal–organic frameworks for organic transformations by photocatalysis and photothermal catalysis
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00095A, Review Article
Hong-Guang Jin, Peng-Cheng Zhao, Yunyang Qian, Juan-Ding Xiao, Zi-Sheng Chao, Hai-Long Jiang
This review summarizes recent advances on metal–organic framework-based materials for organic transformations by photocatalysis and photothermal catalysis.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
